# memory & central auditory processing
*presented at JDVAC 2021*

Central auditory processing describes how the brain processes sound beyond the cochlea. Some assessment tools for central auditory processing can be especially challenging for veterans at elevated risk for memory deficits related to traumatic brain injuries and/or post-traumatic stress disorder.

# comorbidities & hearing loss in veterans
*presented at JDVAC 2021*

More and more veterans returning from Iraq and Afghanistan are complaining of having hearing problems, but their hearing tests are typically normal. Might their comorbidities explain their hearing problems?
